forum.content:
大家好，我是在西雅圖長大的Shen, 我這禮拜六會到勤美走走，如果有人需要英文指導我們可以邊散步邊聊天，女孩歡迎，男孩也歡迎。

Greetings peeps, I'm Shen, I've recently returned to Taiwan from the US. This Saturday I'll be taking a walk at Qingmei if anyone is interested, we can hang out. Gents and ladies are both welcome to join me :)
forum.title: Take a walk, have a talk
